content: ❤️ in this crochet video tutorial we re going to make an adorable teddy bear amigurumi step-by-step it s super cute quick and easy to make español https //youtu be/-7p3zet_jba english https //youtu be/xr7s1zi-qtg important note you can also get the written pattern in my etsy store https //amigurumisatina etsy com/listing/1813955238 materials used chenille yarn khaki 09 beige 04 you can find them here https //s click aliexpress com/e/_ddrqp97 cotton yarn brown 26 white 63 you can find it here https //s click aliexpress com/e/_dekgh5t difficulty level 3/5 intermediate available languages english spanish final size 18cm / 7 inches tall varies depending on materials used ❤️ if you love amigurumis and want to discover more fun and unique patterns please subscribe to my youtube channel and turn on the notification bell so you don t miss any new videos ❤️ please note this pattern is for personal use only it is prohibited to share distribute or publish this pattern on social networks or any other means ✅ you can sell the finished items don t forget to give credit to amigurumisatina as the designer enjoy crocheting and may your teddy bear come to life with lots of love ♥
